Class unwarpJProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • unwarpJProgressBar

  • class unwarpJProgressBar
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the interactions when dealing with ImageJ's progress bar.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int completed 
      private static long lastTime 
      private static long TIME_QUANTUM
      Same time constant than in ImageJ version 1.22

        public static void addWorkload(int batch)
        Extend the amount of work to perform by batch.

        public static void resetProgressBar()
        Erase the progress bar and cancel pending operations.

      • skipProgressBar

        public static void skipProgressBar(int stride)
        Perform stride operations at once.
        Parameters:
        stride - Amount of work that is skipped.

        Perform 1 operation unit.
